Class NodeRendererRegistry

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Registry for custom node type renderers. Register custom renderers to handle specific node types.

public class NodeRendererRegistry
